name: UZXCoin
description: UZX is a platform token for UZX.com (Universal Zone Exchange), UZX.com is an internationalized digital asset derivatives exchange based on Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) governance, aiming to provide global users with safe, stable, convenient, fair and reputable blockchain asset trading services. UZX.com provides spot trading, perpetual contracts, options, NFT, financial management, lending, and other one-stop crypto asset services.
